definitions.body: :49 et m.:14 (Suxem; LXXL oft. Si/kima Lag BN 57):

district in N. Palestine (prob. shoulder (saddle ?) of mount.);—´[[מְקוֹם שׁ]]: Ge 12:6, [[שְׁכֶָמָךְ]] Ge 37:14; = city ([[שְׁכֶָמָה שְֶׁכֶם]], Ho 6:9 [[שֶָׁכְמָךְ]]) Jos 24:1; ´[[עִיר שׁ]]: Ge 33:18 + 20 t. Ju Jdg 9 (´[[בַּעֲלֵי שׁ]]: v:Jdg 9:2 + 12 t., ´[[מִגְדַּל־שׁ]] :´[[ב]]: v:Jdg 9:46, v:Jdg 9:47), Ho 6:9 + 21 t. (´[[עִיר שׁ]]: Ge 33:18); city of refuge Jos 20:7, Jos 21:21, 1Ch 6:52.—WMM:As. u. Eur. 394, cp. Egypt. Sa-ka-ma; (cf. Jen:ZA x (1895) 356); mod. Nablûs (from Rom. name Neapolis); v. Buhl G 200 f. GASm:G 332 ff. 345 Wilsons:Hast. DB SHECHEM.
